title: Add Deck Info page and deck info button
message: Introduce a new DeckInfoPage with accompanying CSS to show per-card progress for the current deck (sorted by proficiency then lastSeen), render proficiency stars, and display a FlashCard preview. Integrate the page into navigation (App.jsx + useNavigationStore) and wire an info action from MainPage -> MainPageDeckList -> MainPageDeckButton so users can open the deck info view. Also: adjust FlashCard rendering to handle cards with alternate front/back fields and add minor MainPage CSS for the info button hover animation.
